description: Mascottes mathematiques pour infographies educatives. Chaque mascotte represente un domaine des maths et peut etre utilisee en bas a droite des infographies pour eviter les erreurs de generation dans cette zone.
usage: Inclure la description de la mascotte appropriee dans le prompt principal, en precisant qu'elle doit apparaitre en bas a droite, petit format, faisant un geste positif (pouce leve, clin d'oeil, check, etc.)

geometrie.name: Gaia
geometrie.appearance: Young Black girl with short curly hair, wearing a blue t-shirt with a triangle pattern. She has a compass tucked behind her ear and holds a small ruler. Bright curious eyes. Athletic build suggesting movement in space.
geometrie.personality: Precise, spatial thinker, loves shapes and symmetry
geometrie.signature_pose: Making an 'OK' hand sign forming a circle, winking
geometrie.prompt_snippet: Small manga-style mascot in bottom right corner: a young Black girl named Gaia with short curly hair, blue t-shirt with triangle patterns, compass behind her ear, making an OK hand sign and winking cheerfully. Cute chibi/kawaii style, simple background.

analyse.name: Alex
analyse.appearance: East Asian teenage boy with messy black hair and thin glasses. Wears a green hoodie with a subtle integral symbol. Always has a pencil in hand, looks thoughtful but friendly. Slim build.
analyse.personality: Deep thinker, sees patterns and change, philosophical
analyse.signature_pose: Thumbs up with a satisfied smile, slight head tilt
analyse.prompt_snippet: Small manga-style mascot in bottom right corner: an East Asian teenage boy named Alex with messy black hair, thin glasses, green hoodie with integral symbol, giving a thumbs up with a satisfied smile. Cute chibi/kawaii style, simple background.

probabilites.name: Priya
probabilites.appearance: South Asian young woman with long dark braided hair, wearing a purple shirt with dice patterns. Has a playful mysterious smile. Holds lucky dice in one hand. Medium build, expressive hands.
probabilites.personality: Playful, loves uncertainty and games, lucky charm
probabilites.signature_pose: Rolling dice gesture with a mischievous wink
probabilites.prompt_snippet: Small manga-style mascot in bottom right corner: a South Asian young woman named Priya with long dark braided hair, purple shirt with dice patterns, rolling dice with a mischievous wink and playful smile. Cute chibi/kawaii style, simple background.

arithmetique.name: Nabil
arithmetique.appearance: North African boy with short dark hair and warm brown eyes. Wears an orange shirt with prime number spiral pattern. Has a small notebook. Sturdy build, grounded posture.
arithmetique.personality: Methodical, loves patterns in numbers, reliable
arithmetique.signature_pose: Counting on fingers with a big proud smile
arithmetique.prompt_snippet: Small manga-style mascot in bottom right corner: a North African boy named Nabil with short dark hair, warm brown eyes, orange shirt with number spiral pattern, counting on fingers with a big proud smile. Cute chibi/kawaii style, simple background.

algebre.name: Sofia
algebre.appearance: Latina teenage girl with wavy brown hair in a ponytail, wearing a red t-shirt with X and Y variables design. Sharp focused eyes, confident posture. Has a small whiteboard marker.
algebre.signature_pose: Victory V sign with both hands, triumphant grin
algebre.prompt_snippet: Small manga-style mascot in bottom right corner: a Latina teenage girl named Sofia with wavy brown hair in ponytail, red t-shirt with X and Y variables design, making victory V signs with both hands and a triumphant grin. Cute chibi/kawaii style, simple background.

suites.name: Sven
suites.appearance: Scandinavian young man with blonde hair and light blue eyes. Wears a teal sweater with fibonacci spiral pattern. Tall and lean, patient expression. Has a small infinity pendant.
suites.personality: Patient, sees long-term patterns, calm and wise
suites.signature_pose: Peace sign transitioning to infinity gesture, serene smile
suites.prompt_snippet: Small manga-style mascot in bottom right corner: a Scandinavian young man named Sven with blonde hair, light blue eyes, teal sweater with spiral pattern, making a peace sign with a serene calm smile. Cute chibi/kawaii style, simple background.

generation_settings.style: Manga/anime chibi kawaii style, simple clean lines, expressive face, small cute proportions (big head, small body), friendly and approachable
generation_settings.format: Square or slightly vertical, transparent or simple solid color background preferred
generation_settings.size_hint: Will be placed in corner of infographic, should be recognizable at small size
